data.title: The Mind and Art of Giovanni Battista Piranesi
data.meta_description: London: Thames and Hudson, 1988. Softcover. Gold cloth, b/w pictorial DJ. 304 pp. 391 bw plates. VG. Item #107063 ISBN: 9780500274774 Covers every asplect of Piranesi's life and work, emphasizing his importance as a pioneer of Roman archaeology, the high quality of his technical illustrations, and his role as Roman champion in the great Graeco-Roman debate of the 1760s from DJ .
data.text:
Wilton-Ely, John

London: Thames and Hudson, 1988. Softcover. Gold cloth, b/w pictorial DJ. 304 pp. 391 bw plates. VG. Item #107063

ISBN: 9780500274774

Covers every asplect of Piranesi's life and work, emphasizing his importance as a pioneer of Roman archaeology, the high quality of his technical illustrations, and his role as Roman champion in the great Graeco-Roman debate of the 1760s (from DJ).
